Plot: A Dogme film about an engaged couple that is torn apart after the man is paralyzed in an accident, and the woman falls in love with the husband of the woman who caused the accident.
Title: Open Hearts
Actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Sonja Richter, Nikolaj Lie Kaas, Paprika Steen
tomatoConsensus: Pulsing with honesty, this film lays bare the rawness of human emotion with a story made all the more believable thanks to its gritty, low-budget approach.
